OrgName.entry: CHILDREN AND FAMILY COURT ADVISORY AND SUPPORT SERVICE (CAFCASS)

Desc.entry: Children and family reporters assist family courts to reach difficult decisions about the future of children when relationships between parents break down. Incorporates the Guardian Service and the Office of the Official Solicitor function concerning children through CAFCASS Legal. Referrals accepted through the court system.
